hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export GOPATH=$WORKSPACE/go export PATH="$PATH:$(go env GOPATH)/bin"
go get github.com/tools/godep go get github.com/smartystreets/goconvey go get github.com/GeertJohan/go.rice/rice go get github.com/wickett/word-cloud-generator/wordyapi go get github.com/gorilla/mux
sed -i "s/1.DEVELOPMENT/1.$BUILD_NUMBER/g" static/version
GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ./artifacts/word-cloud-generator -v
md5sum artifacts/word-cloud-generator ls -l artifacts/
gzip -f ./artifacts/word-cloud-generator

org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
sudo service wordcloud stop
sudo curl -u downloader:123 -X GET "http://192.168.56.20:8081/repository/world-cloud-build/1/world-cloud-generator/1.$BUILD_NUMBER/world-cloud-generator-1.$BUILD_NUMBER.gz" -o /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator.gz sudo ls -l /opt/wordcloud sudo gunzip -f /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator.gz sudo chmod +x /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator
sudo service wordcloud start

res=`curl -u downloader:123 -s -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"ths is a really really really important thing this is"}' http://192.168.56.30:8888/version | jq '. | length'` if [ "1" != "$res" ]; then exit 99 fi
res=`curl -u downloader:123 -s -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"ths is a really really really important thing this is"}' http://192.168.56.30:8888/api | jq '. | length'` if [ "7" != "$res" ]; then exit 99 fi

sudo service wordcloud stop
sudo curl -X GET "http://192.168.56.20:8081/repository/world-cloud-build/1/world-cloud-generator/1.$BUILD_NUMBER/world-cloud-generator-1.$BUILD_NUMBER.gz" -o /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator.gz sudo ls -l /opt/wordcloud sudo gunzip -f /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator.gz sudo chmod +x /opt/wordcloud/word-cloud-generator
sudo service wordcloud start

res=`curl -u downloader:123 -s -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"ths is a really really really important thing this is"}' http://192.168.56.30:8888/version | jq '. | length'` if [ "1" != "$res" ]; then exit 99 fi
res=`curl -u downloader:123 -s -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"ths is a really really really important thing this is"}' http://192.168.56.30:8888/api | jq '. | length'` if [ "7" != "$res" ]; then exit 99 fi
